descriptionHtml:
this is a fix by AlekseiVasiliev for Fallout New Vegas that I slightly modified to be used in Skyrim for people having frame rate drop issues and graphic glitches with ATI/AMD video cards.

DROP FILE IN THE SKYRIM DIRECTORY NOT THE DATA DIRECTORY.

My apologies, I forgot to include install directions I have tried to add but Comcast is having issues in my area and they have been slow to fix the problem, LOL! like that\'s a surprise!!!
author: zr1vetteowner

files.name: Anderson Formal Suit with Skin
files.fileName: fix for ATI AMD video cards-48-1-0.rar
